author: Special Correspondent
text:
Southern Railway will be operating special Suvidha trains between Chennai and Tirunelveli and Coimbatore in March to clear the extra rush of passengers.

A press release said train no. 00648 will leave Chennai Central at 10.30 p.m. on March 6 and reach Coimbatore the next day at 6.40 a.m. It will have stops at Katpadi, Jolarpettai, Salem, Erode and Tiruppur.

Train no. 00651 will leave Tirunelveli at 2.45 p.m. on March 8 and reach Egmore the next at 4.20 a.m.
title: Special trains to clear rush in March
